name: Lewie Steinberg
description: '''Lewie Polk Steinberg'''{{efn|Steinberg's given name was often recorded incorrectly as "Lewis" or "Louis."<ref>{{cite book |last=Bowman |first=Rob |date=1997 |title=Soulsville, U.S.A.: The Story of Stax Records |location=New York |publisher=Schirmer Books |page=26 |isbn=0-02-860268-4}}</ref>}} (September 13, 1933 â€“ July 21, 2016) was an American musician best known as the original [[bass guitar]] player for the [[soul music]] group [[Booker T. & the M.G.'s]].
